generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

bluetooth.locationRequiredTitle: Location is required for Bluetooth LE
bluetooth.locationRequiredMessage: On Android, location permission is required to be able to list Bluetooth LE devices.
bluetooth.checkEnabled: Please enable Bluetooth in your phone settings

location.disabled: Enable Location in Settings. Ledger Live requires location services to pair your device.
location.noInfos: Ledger does not use your location information.

partners.title: Trade & Exchange
partners.subtitle: Try a few services we've selected
partners.btcdirect: Buy and sell with the greatest of ease at Europe's leading cryptocurrency broker. Sign up for free and receive your coins within minutes! Our users rate us with an 8,7 on Trustpilot
partners.changelly: Changelly is a popular instant crypto asset exchange with 100+ coins and tokens listed.
partners.changenow: ChangeNOW is one of the leading custody-free instant exchange services
partners.coinberry: Coinberry is the most trusted crypto platform in Canada with better-than-bank security, best-in-class user interface and No Fee funding & withdraw. Pre-register to get early access to our platform if you are not a Canadian citizen.
partners.coinhouse: Coinhouse is a trusted platform for individuals and institutional investors looking to analyze, acquire, sell and securely store crypto assets.
partners.coinmama: Coinmama is a financial service that makes it fast, safe and fun to buy digital assets, anywhere in the world.
partners.genesis: Genesis is an institutional trading firm offering liquidity and borrow for digital currencies, including bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin, and XRP.
partners.kyberswap: Fast, simple and secure token swap platform. Powered by Kyber Network's on-chain liquidity protocol.
partners.luno: Luno makes it safe and easy to buy, store and learn about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum
partners.paybis: it is safe and easy to Buy Bitcoin with credit card from PayBis. Service operates in US, Canada, Germany, Russia and Saudi Arabia.
partners.shapeshift: ShapeShift is an online marketplace where users can buy and sell digital assets. It is a fast and secure way for the world to buy and sell digital assets, with no lengthy signup process, no counterparty risk, and no friction.
partners.simplex: Simplex is a EU licensed financial institution, providing a fraudless credit card payment solution.
partners.taxtoken: Automated cryptocurrency tax and cost basis software for US citizens.
partners.thorswap: ThorSwap is an instant, safe and fair crypto asset market powered by decentralized atomic swap technologies. It is the most convenient way to start trading, no registration or KYC for small amount transactions.
partners.bitpanda: Bitpanda is Europe’s leading retail broker for buying and selling Bitcoin, Ethereum, IOTA and many more. Deposit money using your credit card, SOFORT-Transfer, NETELLER, and other options.
partners.exmo: Founded in 2013 and based in London, Kiev, Barcelona, and Moscow, EXMO is #1 exchange in Eastern Europe, and one of the world's largest global exchanges in volume and liquidity.

signout.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
signout.disclaimer: All accounts data will be removed from your phone.

biometrics.title: {{biometricsType}} unlock failed
biometrics.authenticate: Please authenticate to Ledger Live app

failed.denied: Auth Security was not enabled because your phone failed to authenticate.
failed.title: Authentication failed

unlock.biometricsTitle: Please authenticate to Ledger Live app
unlock.title: Welcome back

reset.description: Reset all Ledger Live data, including accounts and settings? The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your device and Recovery sheet.

stepWelcome.title: Welcome to Ledger Live
stepWelcome.desc: Easily manage crypto secured by your {{fullDeviceName}}. Everywhere you go.

stepChooseDevice.fallbackDesc: You can import your {{oldDeviceName}} accounts from Ledger Live desktop to check your balance on the go. To manage secure transactions everywhere you go, consider upgrading to a {{fullDeviceName}}.

stepLegacy.bannerDescription: To manage secure transactions everywhere you go, consider upgrading to a Ledger Nano X
stepLegacy.description: You can import your accounts from Ledger Live desktop to check your balance on the go.

stepSetupPin.step1: Turn on your {{fullDeviceName}} and follow the instructions.
stepSetupPin.step2: Press both buttons to choose <1><1>Setup as new device.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step2-restore: Press both buttons to choose <1><1>Restore from recovery phrase.</1></1>
stepSetupPin.step3: Press left or right button to select a digit. Press both to validate.

modal.step3: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase

stepWriteRecovery.step1: Write <1><1>Word #1</1></1> in position 1 on a blank recovery sheet
stepWriteRecovery.step2: Press the right button to continue and write down all 24 words.
stepWriteRecovery.step3: Confirm your recovery phrase: select and validate each word by pressing both buttons.

modal.step1: Carefully secure your 24-word recovery phrase out of sight.
modal.step2: Make sure you are the sole holder of your recovery phrase.
modal.step3: Ledger does not keep any backup of your recovery phrase.
modal.step4: Never use a device supplied with a recovery phrase or a PIN code.

stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step2: Choose the length of your recovery phrase.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step3: Enter the first letters of <1><1>Word #1</1></1> until suggested words appear.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step4: Choose <1><1>Word #1</1></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons.
stepWriteRecoveryRestore.step5: Repeat the process until the last word.

pinCode.title: Did you choose your PIN code by yourself?
pinCode.error: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code. Please contact us when in doubt.

recoveryPhrase.title: Did you save your recovery phrase by yourself?
recoveryPhrase.error: Never use a device supplied with a recovery phrase. Please contact us when in doubt.

stepPassword.desc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your phone.

modal.step1: Make sure to remember your password. Do not share it.
modal.step2: Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.
modal.step3: Resetting Ledger Live does not affect your crypto assets.

stepFinish.title: Your device is ready!
stepFinish.desc: Install some apps on your device and access your portfolio

stepScanQR.title: Please go to <1>Settings > Export accounts > Export</1> in the desktop app and scan the LiveQR code

portfolio.summary: Here's the summary of your account

emptyState.title: Add accounts to your portfolio
emptyState.desc: Open the Manager to install apps on your Ledger device before you start adding accounts to your portfolio
emptyState.descWithApp: Add accounts once you've installed apps on your device in Manager

noOpState.title: No operations yet?
noOpState.desc: Simply send some crypto assets to your receiving address and wait for the app to sync

tradingDisclaimer.title: Trade Safely
tradingDisclaimer.text1: Before sending and receiving crypto assets, educate yourself to make informed decisions. Crypto assets are volatile and the prices can go up and down. Carefully evaluate your trading goals and the financial risk you are willing to take.
tradingDisclaimer.text2: Please be aware that Ledger does not provide financial, tax, or legal advice. You should take such decisions on your own or rely on opinions of licensed experts.

emptyState.title: No crypto assets yet?
emptyState.desc: Make sure the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app is installed and start receiving

delete.title: Remove account from portfolio
delete.desc: The stored data will be removed
delete.confirmationDesc: Deleting an account does not affect your crypto assets. Accounts can always be re-added.

scan.title: Scan LiveQR code

descTop.line1: In Ledger Live desktop, go to

scan.descBottom: Please put the LiveQR code within the square

result.title: Import accounts
result.descEmpty: <0><0>No accounts</0></0> were found. Please try again or go back to the onboarding

fallback.title: Enable camera
fallback.desc: Please enable Camera in Settings to scan QR codes

importNotification.message: Your accounts have successfully been imported!

display.title: General
display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.passwordDesc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your phone.
display.counterValueDesc: Set the currency shown next to your balance and operations.
display.exchangeDesc: Set provider of exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display an increase in market value in green. Choose Eastern to display an increase in market value in red.
display.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.
display.developerModeDesc: Show developer apps in the Manager and enable testnet apps.
display.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience.

analyticsModal.title: Share analytics
analyticsModal.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience
analyticsModal.bullet6: Number of accounts, currencies and operations

display.technicalDataDesc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience.

technicalDataModal.title: Technical data
technicalDataModal.desc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience
technicalDataModal.bullet2: Ledger Live version, OS region, language and region

display.termsOfUseDesc: By continuing you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

currencies.title: Currencies
currencies.desc: Set rate provider and number of confirmations per crypto.
currencies.rateProviderDesc: Choose the provider of the rate between {{currencyTicker}} and Bitcoin
currencies.confirmationNbDesc: Number of network confirmations to mark a transaction as confirmed.

about.title: About
about.desc: App information, terms and conditions, and privacy policy.
about.appDescription: The perfect companion for your {{fullDeviceName}}. Add new crypto assets and check your balance in just a few taps.
about.termsConditionsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our terms and conditions.
about.privacyPolicyDesc: Learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use it.

liveReview.title: Rate the app!
liveReview.android: Review in the Google Play store

help.title: Help
help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or get help.
help.supportDesc: A problem? Get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.configureDeviceDesc: Set up as new or restore a device. Accounts and settings are preserved.
help.clearCacheModalDesc: Clearing the Ledger Live cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are not affected. The private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Ledger device and on your Recovery sheet.
help.exportLogsDesc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.
help.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your phone, including accounts and settings.
help.repairDeviceDesc: If you encountered some issue while updating your device and cannot resume the update process, you can try this option to repair your device

receive.title: Receive
receive.verifySkipped: Your receive address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify your {{accountType}} address for optimal security
receive.verifyPending: Verify the {{currencyName}} address above matches the one on your device
receive.verified: Address confirmed, re-verify if you copy or scan it.

notSynced.desc: This may take a while if you have many transactions or a slow internet connection

readOnly.title: Receive
readOnly.desc: You are about to generate an address which has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify it for optimal security.
readOnly.verify: Your {{accountType}} address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify it for optimal security.

scan.title: Scan QR code
scan.descBottom: Please put the QR code within the square

fallback.title: Enable camera
fallback.desc: Please enable Camera in Settings to scan QR codes

summary.infoTotalDesc: Includes transaction amount and the selected network fees

validation.title: Please verify all transaction details on your {{productName}}
validation.message: Confirm the transaction on your device to securely sign it
validation.disclaimer: Always verify that your device displays the address exactly as provided by the recipient
validation.confirm: Your account balance will update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction

quitConfirmation.title: Cancel add account
quitConfirmation.desc: You are about to cancel the Add account flow, do you wish to continue?

success.desc: View your accounts or add more of them

addAccounts.synchronizingDesc: We are synchronizing your accounts, this can take a while...
addAccounts.noAccountToCreate: No <1><0>{{currencyName}}</></> account was found to create. Restart the flow and sync your accounts
addAccounts.cantCreateAccount: There are no transactions on your last created <1><0>{{accountName}}</></> account. You must first receive crypto assets on that account before you can add a new one.

SelectDevice.headerDescription: Please make sure your {{productName}} is unlocked with Bluetooth enabled
SelectDevice.usb: To use USB, just plug and enter your PIN Code on your device

receiveVerify.title: Verify address on device
receiveVerify.description: Verify the {{currencyName}} address above matches the one on your device

editDeviceName.title: Press both buttons to allow set device name

Paired.title: Pairing successful
Paired.desc: Your {{productName}} is ready to use with Ledger Live

Pairing.step1: Validate on your phone if the code matches with your {{productName}}
Pairing.step2: Validate on your {{productName}} by pressing both buttons

GenuineCheck.accept: Please don’t turn off your Nano X and allow <1>Ledger Manager</1>

readOnly.title: Nano X
readOnly.description: Set up Ledger Live with your Ledger Nano X to install apps, create accounts and manage  secure transactions everywhere you go.
readOnly.question: Got your Ledger Nano X?

unpair.title: Unpair device
unpair.description: Are you sure? You can pair your {{productName}} again at any time.

loading.title: Installing {{appName}}
loading.desc: Please wait while the {{appName}} app is installed

FirmwareUpdateRow.title: Firmware version {{version}} available
FirmwareUpdateRow.subtitle: Please use Ledger Live Desktop to update

Installing.title: {{stepName}}...
Installing.subtitle: If asked on device, please enter your pin code to finish the process

FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}.</0></1>
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription1: Please note that all the apps installed on your device will be deleted. You will be able to re-install your apps after the firmware update.
FirmwareUpdateReleaseNotes.introDescription2: This does not affect your crypto assets.

FirmwareUpdateCheckId.title: Identifier
FirmwareUpdateCheckId.description: Please press both buttons on your {{fullDeviceName}} if it displays the same identifier:

FirmwareUpdateMCU.title: Restart device
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc1: Unplug your device from your computer
FirmwareUpdateMCU.desc2: Press and hold left button and plug your device until the bootloader screen appears

FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.title: Firmware updated
FirmwareUpdateConfirmation.description: Open the Manager to re-install the apps on your device
